name: Armor Material Expertise
description: You tap into the potential of your armor’s special material.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6 or fighter level 4th, armor training class feature
benefit: When wearing armor made of one of the materials listed below, you can use the listed ability twice per day (unless otherwise stated).
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to use an ability for a material, even though your armor isn’t made of it. This still counts against your daily limit of armor material abilities. (See page 16.)
